title: The Hydra
creator_credit: Percy Smith, Julian Huxley and Gaumont-British Instructional
brief_description: The first part of this film studies the natural surroundings of the hydra, and the structure of the organism and the second part focuses on the process of regeneration after bisection, the manner in which food is caught and digested, sexual reproduction by eggs and sperm, and a sexual reproduction by budding.
